${modID}:SlimeShield.NAME: Slime Shield
${modID}:SlimeShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Slimed to your hand.

${modID}:Analyze.NAME: Analyze
${modID}:Analyze.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BloodBarrier.NAME: Blood Barrier
${modID}:BloodBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn, lose 1 HP and gain !B! Block.

${modID}:HiddenBlade.NAME: Hidden Blade
${modID}:HiddenBlade.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards. NL Add !M! shiv into your hand.
${modID}:HiddenBlade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards. NL Add !M! shivs into your hand.

${modID}:TearGas.NAME: Tear Gas
${modID}:TearGas.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply !M! Poison.

${modID}:Strike_R.NAME: Strike
${modID}:Strike_R.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain [E].

${modID}:Defend_R.NAME: Defend
${modID}:Defend_R.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! Block for each enemy in combat.

${modID}:Strike_G.NAME: Strike
${modID}:Strike_G.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, draw 1 additional card.

${modID}:Defend_G.NAME: Defend
${modID}:Defend_G.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, gain !B! Block.

${modID}:Strike_P.NAME: Strike
${modID}:Strike_P.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle an *Insight into your draw pile.

${modID}:Defend_P.NAME: Defend
${modID}:Defend_P.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If the last card played this combat was a skill scry 2 and draw 1 card.
